roleset.name: threaten
roleset.note: MENACE-V NOTES: Differences between this frame and that of 'threaten' may beattributed to the fact that 'menace' is a more canonical member of 31.1,whereas 'threaten' is more similar to verbs of speaking. Frame by Claire (from menace.01-v)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from Arg 0

example.name: all arguments
example.text: After a few drinks, Mary menaces society by getting behind the wheel.
